hero.title: Best <cookie> Private Server
hero.description: gsu! is a brand-new osu! third-party server <highlight-1>. It supports osu!std, osu!taiko, osu!ctb, and osu!mania, along with RX/AP pp calc and unlimited username changes, giving you freedom on your osu! journey.
hero.status.serverdown: Server seems to be experiencing issues
hero.status.description: Join QQ / Discord for support & updates
hero.features.1.title: Play Anywhere
hero.features.1.text: gsu! works on any platform that runs osu! lazer. No limits, no hassle.
hero.features.2.title: Fast Beatmaps
hero.features.2.text: Sayobot mirrors let players in China download beatmaps at high speed for free.
hero.features.3.title: Active Community
hero.features.3.text: Join our QQ and Discord servers to get help, show off, or just chat.
hero.features.4.title: Customizable
hero.features.4.text: Change your username, upload a profile cover, and style your profile and signature.
hero.features.5.title: Developer-Friendly
hero.features.5.text: Our server follows osu! v1/v2 API specs, making bot and service integration fast and easy.
hero.features.6.title: Open Source
hero.features.6.text: Server and client are fully open source and free. Hooks let you extend functionality (WIP).
hero.features.7.title: Submit Beatmaps
hero.features.7.text: Submit your own or unrankable beatmaps for approval in order to get performance points (WIP).
hero.features.8.title: Rulesets Ranking
hero.features.8.text: Score and submit results for custom rulesets with full leaderboard support (WIP).
news.title: What's New
news.description: Catch up on our latest news, including events, server updates, and more.
